text:
hey guys,

im not sure if this is the right channel for this questions but Im looking to build a react tool and add to my website which is built using HS CMS. Is that possible to have the react landing page hosted in another server to have an URL like this <http://mysite.com/react-landingpage|mysite.com/react-landingpage>?

Hey <@U0142ETQTGS>,

Got excited there and hit enter too early hahaha â€” This is likely a better question for <#C22PU4LV8|general>. In short this is much more a DNS question than anything. Im no expert on it but the short answer would be no, but there may be someone who knows more about proxying domains and hosts and what not that might be able to make this a reality.
